column4: Hello can someone help me out with installing the new nvidia drivers please?
Hello can someone help me out with installing the new nvidia drivers please?
have you tried using restricted drivers manager?
get another computer and log into IRC from there if possible
can you tell me what to do so I can write it down please?
log in with your normal username and password
you probably need kernel development files
actually, the proper way to do it would be linux-headers-$(uname -r)
